sense.def:
To stop doing something
pomeni nečesa ne več delati.

seg.quote: She stopped work to have her baby.
Stop it! You're hurting!
She put the key in the keyhole, began turning it, and then she stopped.
We all stopped talking.
He couldn't stop crying.

sense.def:
To stop something
pomeni preprečiti, da bi se nekaj zgodilo ali nadaljevalo.

seg.quote: You're trying to stop my trip to London.
How do I stop a tap dripping?
Nothing was going to stop Sandy from being a writer.

sense.def:
An activity or process stops
rečemo, kadar se neka dejavnost ali proces konča.

seg.quote: The music stopped abruptly.
They were waiting for the rain to stop.

sense.def:
Kadar stroj ali naprava
stops
ali kadar nekdo
stops a machine or device
, neki stroj ali naprava ne deluje ve&ccaron ali je izklopljena.

seg.quote: My watch has stopped.
Stop the recording now.

sense.def:
Kadar osebe ali stvari, ki se premikajo,
stop
ali
are stopped
, se nič več ne premikajo.

seg.quote: He followed them for a few yards, and then stopped.
The train stopped at Watford.
Stop people in Oxford Street and ask them to answer these questions.
Stop the car and let me out.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj, kar se premika,
comes to a stop
, se nič več ne premika.

seg.quote: The elevator came to a stop on the main floor.
Harris brought the plane to a stop.

sense.def:
A stop
je kraj, kjer se avtobusi ali vlaki redno ustavljajo, da potniki lahko vstopajo in izstopajo.

seg.quote: We'll get off at the next stop.

sense.def:
To stop somewhere on a journey
ali
to stop off on a journey
pomeni nekje se ustaviti za krajši čas, preden nadaljujemo potovanje.

seg.quote: On my way home I stopped at the shop.
I stopped off in London.

sense.def:
Med potovanjem je
a stop
čas ali kraj, kjer se ustavimo.

seg.quote: The first stop was a hotel outside Paris.

sense.def:
To stop someone's pay or a cheque
pomeni preprečiti izplačilo denarja za plačo ali ček.

To put a stop to something
pomeni preprečiti, da bi se nekaj zgodilo ali nadaljevalo.

seg.quote: We must put a stop to all this nonsense.
